title: This is a Test
content:
This is only a test:  
 [http://ajax.sayitaintslow.com/fontgame/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131104012923/http:/ajax.sayitaintslow.com/fontgame/ "http://ajax.sayitaintslow.com/fontgame/")  
however, it would be more fun if it were more than "rather" difficult.
author: paul d hunt

comments.content: Bookmarked on the spot! I did try six times, and I actually was right at all times...
I got them all right also one time around. I'm not that good at type ID, but it is made much easier here by being multiple choice, as you can eliminate by style...
Nice to know, at least with the classics, I can get a perfect score.
